titleStmt.title: King Charles vindicated, or The grand cheats of the nation discovered. With an abstract of 1 The Rumps extraordinary exactions, 2 Their large distributions of other mens estates. By W.L. a lover of his country·
titleStmt.author: W. L., a lover of his country.

notesStmt.note: The words "The Rumps .. mens estates." are bracketed together on title page, with numbers at left.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 17. 1659"; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
